com.salimov.yurii.controller.client

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.controller.client.MainController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminMainController, ClientMainController

    public abstract class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract class implements a set of methods for working with main ModelAndView object. Class methods create and return modelsAndView, depending on the request. For the work used implementation of the interface CacheMVFabric with implementation MainMVFabric interface.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yuriy.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    CacheMVFabric, MainMVFabric

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CompanyService companyService
      The implementation of the interface describes a set of methods for working with objects of the Company class.
      private MainMVFabric fabric
      The implementation of the interface provides a set of standard methods for creates and returns the main modelAndViews.
      private MessageService messageService
      The implementation of the interface describes a set of methods for working with objects of the Message class.
      private ResponseService responseService
      The implementation of the interface describes a set of methods for working with objects of the Response class.
      private SenderService senderService
      The implementation of the interface describes a set of methods for working with E-mail.
      protected UserService userService
      The implementation of the interface describes a set of methods for working with objects of the User class.

                         CompanyService companyService,
                         UserService userService,
                         ResponseService responseService,
                         MessageService messageService,
                         SenderService senderService)
        Constructor. Initializes a implementation of the service layer interface.
        Parameters:
        fabric - a implementation of the MainMVFabric interface.
        companyService - a implementation of the CompanyService interface.
        userService - a implementation of the UserService interface.
        responseService - a implementation of the ResponseService interface.
        messageService - a implementation of the MessageService interface.
        senderService - a implementation of the SenderService interface.
        See Also:
        CompanyService, UserService, ResponseService, MessageService, SenderService, MainMVFabric
